sentences.sContent: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.sContent_eng: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.sCn: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.sContent: To assemble a prairie takes time -- even if you have all the pieces.
sentences.sContent_eng: To assemble a prairie takes time -- even if you have all the pieces.
sentences.sCn: 整合一个大草原需要时间——哪怕你手中已掌握了所有分块。

remMethod.val: pr + air(空气) + ie → 大草原上空气好

trans.tranOther: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat
